plan.path.pathfinding
Interface Heuristics

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClosestHeuristic, DiagonalHeuristic, ManhattanHeuristic
public interface Heuristics

An interface used by the A* Search to implement a number of heuristics, all heuritstics have to satisfy the interface framework

Author:
Daniel Stanoescu

Method Summary
 float getCost(WorldMap map, Robot robot, int x, int y, int gx, int gy)
          An interface which supports pluggable heuristics for the A* search:
 

Method Detail

getCost

float getCost(WorldMap map,
              Robot robot,
              int x,
              int y,
              int gx,
              int gy)
An interface which supports pluggable heuristics for the A* search:

Parameters:
map - The map on which we compute the path
robot - The robot that needs to move along the path
x - The 'x' coordinate of the current tile
y - The 'y' coordinate of the current tile
gx - The 'x' coordinate of the goal tile
gy - the 'y' coordinate of the goal tile
Returns:
Returns the heuristic cost associated with the current tile.
